message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is below my minimum price. Could you consider $9,000? I'm confident this product will be highly valuable for you.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still only able to pay up to $8,000. Would you consider meeting me at this price?
